definition: wingless usually flattened bloodsucking insect parasitic on warm-blooded animals
details:
noun
- wingless usually flattened bloodsucking insect parasitic on warm-blooded animals
= synonyms: sucking louse
- wingless insect with mouth parts adapted for biting
= synonyms: bird louse, biting louse
- any of several small insects especially aphids that feed by sucking the juices from plants
= synonyms: plant louse
- a person who has a nasty or unethical character undeserving of respect
= synonyms: worm
